titles.title: To suspend the duty on the synthetic organic coloring matter C.I. Pigment Yellow 110 until January 1, 2000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/31/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1999, the duty on benzoic acid, 2,3,4,5- tetrachloro-6-cyano-, methyl ester, reaction products with p- phenylenediamine and sodium methoxide (C.I. Pigment Yellow 110).
